title: Sunrise
lyrics: Intro:  ,  saeparan haneurinde saeppalgan maeuminde geureoke boiji a na.. anya anya neukkimi wattanikka bokjapae neoraneun saram ttaeme majji maj ji na geureon geo majji sesang modeun bitteuri ssodajin geoya tto museun iri ireonalji algo sipeunde ĐK1: jeogi haeya haeya neoreul bwaya bwaya naega bulhwaksiran miraemajeo jogeumssik deo gakkaweojyeo jabeuryeo halsurok meoreojigo isseo jantteuk geobi naseo naseo gidarigo isseul ge taneun simjangi beotiji mothae nareul jeonbu da bonaelge geuraeya nega tteooreul su itge hae ~ ~ deo isang bulleobwatja amuri geuraebwatja jogeumdo kkumjjeokhaji anchana dwaesseo i je geuman kku meseo kkaeeo na amugeot to moreuncheok haji mara jweo ne saenggageul kyeonoeun chae jami deureodo eochapi a mu ildo i reonaji ana ĐK2: jeogi haeya haeya neoreul bwaya bwaya naega bulhwaksiran miraemajeo jogeumssik deo gakkaweojyeo jabeuryeo halsurok meoreojigo isseo jantteuk geobi naseo naseo gidarigo isseul ge taneun simjangi beotiji mothae nareul jeonbu da bonaelge geuraeya nega tteooreul su itge hae gieok sogeseo neol gieok kae jamsiman nae yaegireul deureojweo nega piryo hae da wa gajana daeche eonje eodum sogeul beoseonage hal geoya ĐK3: chadichan chalranan haeya haeya sumeo bwaya bwaya jeoldae doragaji aneul geoya nareul but jabajweo nega si jakhagil gidarigo isseo cheoeumbuteo ma jimakkka ji ne mameul algo sipeojyeo    ~ ~
